languages.text: "А мне о вас — сообщили". {n}Лицо инквизитора непроницаемо, но под его маской вам чудится огонек насмешки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "А мне о вас — сообщили". {n}Лицо инквизитора непроницаемо, но под его маской вам чудится огонек насмешки.{/n}

languages.text: "I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А мне о вас — сообщили". {n}Лицо инквизитора непроницаемо, но под его маской вам чудится огонек насмешки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "However, I was informed about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}
"However, I was informed about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}
"I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}
"I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}
"I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}

languages.text: 「しかしながら、私はあなたについてすべてを伺っております」{n}異端審問官の表情は揺るがないが、無表情の下にかすかなあざけりが見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「しかしながら、私はあなたについてすべてを伺っております」{n}異端審問官の表情は揺るがないが、無表情の下にかすかなあざけりが見える。{/n}

languages.text: “而我恰恰相反，我已经听说了关于你的一切。”{n}审判官的面容没有任何表情，但在这面具背后，你却察觉到了一丝嘲弄之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “而我恰恰相反，我已经听说了关于你的一切。”{n}审判官的面容没有任何表情，但在这面具背后，你却察觉到了一丝嘲弄之意。{/n}

languages.text: «Sin embargo, a mí me han hablado mucho de usted». {n}El rostro del Inquisidor es impenetrable, pero detectas un toque de burla detrás de su máscara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, a mí me han hablado mucho de usted». {n}El rostro del Inquisidor es impenetrable, pero detectas un toque de burla detrás de su máscara.{/n}

languages.text: « En revanche, on m'a tout dit à votre sujet, » {n}rétorque l'inquisiteur. Malgré son expression impénétrable, vous décelez un soupçon de moquerie dans sa voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « En revanche, on m'a tout dit à votre sujet, » {n}rétorque l'inquisiteur. Malgré son expression impénétrable, vous décelez un soupçon de moquerie dans sa voix.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich hingegen habe alles über Euch erfahren." {n}Aus dem Gesicht des Inquisitors lässt sich nichts ablesen, aber du spürst einen Hauch von Spott hinter seiner Maske.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich hingegen habe alles über Euch erfahren." {n}Aus dem Gesicht des Inquisitors lässt sich nichts ablesen, aber du spürst einen Hauch von Spott hinter seiner Maske.{/n}

languages.text: "Bense hakkında her şeyi öğrendim." {n}Engizisyoncu'nun yüz ifadesinden kastını anlamasan da maskesinin ardından alaycı bir ima seziyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I, however, have been told all about you." {n}The Inquisitor's face is impenetrable, but behind this mask you detect a hint of mockery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öte yandan bense duyacağımı duydum." {n}Engizisyoncunun yüz ifadesi anlaşılır gibi değil ama bu maskenin ardından alaycı bir ima seziyorsun.{/n}
